Error 401.3 - Unauthorized when moving an IIS 7 site

Recently I upgraded my computer and needed to move an IIS 7 website from one computer to another. Â After copying all the files, creating the IIS application, and browsing to the local website, I got a 401.3 unauthorized error: It turns out that after comparing the old and new computer directory permissions, I needed to add "Authenticated Users" to the security tab of the directory where the web files reside: After applying the new security settings, the website loaded properly in my browser.
